name: Chester
message: Hurray! The Time Travel 1000 works again!

name: Chester
message: Oh wait... This isn't my home... Where am I?

name: Chester
message: Oh no! YOU guys came too? What a mess!

name: Chester
message: We need to figure where... and WHEN we are

name: Chester
message: Spiky? You've never said that before

name: Chester
message: Oh hey! It's a viking! Excuse me? Where are we?

name: Chester
message: Oh no... Here we go again

name: Chester
message: Great. A viking that speaks in opera. Perfect.

name: Vick
message: FA DO MI! FA DO MI!

name: Chester
message: Wait! Did you just say 'follow me?'

name: Chester
message: You speak my language??? How is that possible?

name: Helga
message: Oh it's a funny story. I once did some time traveling...

name: Helga
message: I bought this Time Travel Viking Hat for 10 gold

name: Chester
message: That's what happened to me! How do I get home?

name: Helga
message: Sorry I'm not sure. I just kept using the hat until it worked.

name: Helga
message: You're welcome to stay with us until you figure it out though!

name: Helga
message: I'm Helga, and this is Vick the Viking King!

name: Chester
message: This is Kek, and that's Critteroo. I think.

name: Helga
message: Welcome. We were just rehearsing our new opera. Want to join in?

name: Vick
message: DO RE MI FA SO LA TI DO!

name: Chester
message: I am SO getting a refund for this hat
